ygData.subject: Re: Abominus kicks ass...
ygData.msgSnippet: Sinnertwin lands in robot mode, and begins to look around, to see where the attacks are coming from. He jumps and transforms into his creature mode, moving out

Subject: Re: Abominus kicks ass...

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Sinnertwin lands in robot mode, and begins to look around, to see where
the attacks are coming from. He jumps and transforms into his creature
mode, moving out of the way of a few bombs, but the shockwave from the
attack pushes him over. "Why we Split" one head roared. "Yess, we not
finished hunt" chimed in the other.
